#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,*ptr,n,ans,i;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        ptr=new int[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>ptr[i];
        ans=*max_element(ptr,ptr+n);
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
